requireMavenVersion.message: INVALID MAVEN VERSION: It must be at least ${minimum.maven.version}

configuration.bnd: Bundle-Vendor: Eclipse -contract: * -includeresource.about: -about.html jarsigner1: ${osfile;${env;JAVA_HOME}/../bin;${findfile;${env;JAVA_HOME}/../bin;jarsigner*}} jarsigner2: ${if;${isfile;${jarsigner1}};\ ${jarsigner1};\ ${osfile;${env;JAVA_HOME}/bin;${findfile;${env;JAVA_HOME}/bin;jarsigner*}}\ } jarsigner: ${if;${isfile;${jarsigner2}};\ ${jarsigner2};\ ${osfile;${java.home}/../bin;${findfile;${java.home}/../bin;jarsigner*}}\ } -plugin.sign: aQute.bnd.signing.JartoolSigner;alias="selfsigned";path=${jarsigner};keystore="${sensinact.rootdir}/platform/sensinact-security/cert/keystore.jks";storepass="sensiNact_team" -sign: selfsigned -verbose: true
